text:
It may well be time for an overhaul of our tax system.  We can look at taxing the family unit (instead of individual taxation) as was recommended in the Carter Commission but not adopted.  There is much that could be improved and proper consultations and time is required to make the system better in many respects. 
These proposals are NOT a good start. They will set that process back years.

I am telling you this as a tax professional with almost 29 years under my belt (I started in 1987 when we had "tax reform") and as  someone who has read these proposals in detail.  The public has no idea what is in here. These proposals go way beyond the stated objectives.

There are simpler ways to achieve what the current government wants without killing all small businesses.
label: not toxic
